231. Error Handlers


Up: Error Handling Next: Error Classes Previous: Error Handling

Errors occurring during calls to MPI_WIN_CREATE(...,comm,...) cause the error handler currently associated with comm to be invoked. All other RMA calls have an input win argument. When an error occurs during such a call, the error handler currently associated with win is invoked.

The default error handler associated with win is MPI_ERRORS_ARE_FATAL. Users may change this default by explicitly associating a new error handler with win (see Section Error Handling , page Error Handling ).
